# ccc

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

The `ccc` package helps get information from the Colombian Constitutional Court.

You can install the current version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("acastroaraujo/ccc")
```

It has the following functions:

- `ccc_search`
- `ccc_rtf`
- `ccc_text`
- `extract_citations`

For example

```{r}
library(ccc)

results <- ccc_search(
  text = "proceso de paz", 
  date_start = "1998-01-01", 
  date_end = "2022-01-01"
)

df <- ccc_clean_dataset(results)

dplyr::glimpse(df)

url <- sample(df$url, 1)

txt <- ccc_text(url)

txt |> 
  stringr::str_trunc(1e3) |> 
  cat()

table(extract_citations(txt)) |> sort()
```
